title: 214-Japanese Folklore: Take Your Lumps
itunes:title: 214-Japanese Folklore: Take Your Lumps
description:
Two short stories from Japan. On the first, an old man is in a tree surrounded by demons and faced with a desperate choice. On the second, a man has a pet that his wife is not thrilled about, so she makes that known. With scissors.

The creature is a sad cow! Or a vampire! Either way you probably don't want to hang out with it.

Weird flavored soda: https://myths.link/soda

The store: https://myths.link/store

The membership: https://www.mythpodcast.com/membership

itunes:summary: Two short stories from Japan. On the first, an old man is in a tree surrounded by demons and faced with a desperate choice. On the second, a farmer finally catches a notorious trickster who has been stealing his lunch, but tricksters gonna trick.
itunes:author: Jason Weiser, Carissa Weiser
